description.narrative: National HIV-related policies, guidelines, plans incorporate priorities for children, adolescents and pregnant/lactating women by 2018, which contributes to Adolescents And Hiv/Aids, Care And Treatment Of Children Affected By Hiv And Aids, Hiv Prevention, Hiv â€“ General, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision, Protect, Care And Support Children And Families Affected By Hiv, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 90% of children, adolescents and pregnant and lactating women utilize equitable, gender-sensitive HIV prevention, care and treatment services by 2018
